description: After Tom Ricca’s (AKA “The Pharaoh”) electrifying career as a pro wrestler, he couldn't help but crave a return to his Italian roots. Now with his talented family by his side, he proudly provides the streets of Philly with a delicious variety of authentic Italian cannoli! Cannoli World is where you’ll find over 50 flavors of these wonderfully crunchy & creamy sweets. Favorites include The Wine Cannoli (with authentic Italian Ricotta cream with pure grade raspberry wine with a chocolate twist), the Banana Cream Pie (with natural bananas and sweet vanilla cream), Cookies and Cream (with chunks of chocolate cookie and buttercream), just to name a few. For all these, and much, much more, make your way to Cannoli World for a taste of “Mamma Mia!”-worthy Italian treats!
name: Cannoli World
